name: Henghui Ding
content: Henghui Ding Henghui Ding Professor Office: B315 Computing Center, 220 Handan Rd, Fudan University Email: henghui.ding[AT]gmail.com Henghui Ding is currently a Professor at Fudan University. Prior to that, he was a Presidential Postdoctoral Fellow (Principal Investigator) at Nanyang Technological University (NTU) in Singapore, a Postdoctoral Researcher at ETH Zürich in Switzerland, and a Research Scientist at ByteDance AI Lab in Singapore. He received the Ph.D. degree (winner of the Best Thesis Award) from NTU in 2020, and the B.E. degree from Xi’an Jiaotong University in 2016. His research interests broadly include machine learning and computer vision. Specifically, he focuses on scene understanding (e.g., video/image segmentation, detection), AIGC (e.g., video/image generation/editing), multi-modal learning (e.g., vision-language), low-shot learning, and human–computer interaction. He serves/served as an Area Chair of CVPR’(24-26), NeurIPS’(24-25), ICML’25, ICLR’(25-26), AAAI’26, ACM MM’(24-25), BMVC’(24-25), and a Senior Program Committee (SPC) member of AAAI’(22-25), IJCAI’(23-25). He serves as an Associate Editor for IEEE Transactions on Image Processing (TIP). Openings: We are looking for self-motivated undergraduate interns, graduate (Master/Ph.D.) students to join our group. If you are interested, please email me with your resume and transcript. 招生: 26年博士、硕士名额若干，请邮件联系。 News Nov 2025 3 papers accepted to AAAI 2026, 1 Oral. Congratulations to Hengrui and Xincheng!
